content: **joya scarf** ======================================= the joya scarf is a modern crochet scarf pattern with a simple but gorgeous texture and a unique construction start at the centre with a diamond shape and then work your way out until you reach your desired length the tassels at each point add the perfect finishing touch this pattern is written for one size but it is very easy to customize the width and length you ll find all the details in the pattern **yarn** for this scarf you will need any #4/worsted/medium weight yarn i used wecrochet provincial tweed 1 in the colorway frozen pond this yarn is a little on the lighter side for a #4 weight yarn so if your yarn is a heavier worsted or aran weight you might consider going up a hook size for better drape **pattern support** as with all my patterns i am more than happy to offer any help and support that i can - please email me at sarah@nedandmimi com 2 if you have any questions --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 3 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2020 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //shrsl com/3s5p4 2 mailto sarah@nedandmimi com 3 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
